summary: Ego vehicle is approaching an intersection. A white car is to the left. A person on a scooter appears from behind a small green vehicle on the right. A pedestrian appears to be picking something up in the middle of the road.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. White car is stationary. Scooter is moving into the intersection. Pedestrian is picking up an object.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, white car, scooter, pedestrian, green vehicle, intersection
key_actions: potential ghost probing: Scooter appears from behind the green vehicle.
next_action: Ego vehicle will continue moving forward.
